channel.title: Comments on: When Your Spec Lit is Academic
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Bunny Bean
item.dc:creator: Bunny Bean
item.description: Did you happen to publish that paper on The Doctrine of the Labyrinths? Because I am also deeply in love with those books, and I delight to see them mentioned in your column every time. I would love to read your analysis!
item.content:encoded: Did you happen to publish that paper on The Doctrine of the Labyrinths? Because I am also deeply in love with those books, and I delight to see them mentioned in your column every time. I would love to read your analysis!
